ground_truth: He attaches a network of webs to the bridge, inside the dangling cable car. The web is struggling to hold MJ, Spider-Man, and the car. The Goblin sees a tugboat draw near, and hearing the sound of the glider, Spider-Man and MJ look up to see the Goblin on his way towards them. Part of the web gives way, and everything drops 20 feet. MJ clambers over Spider-Man and starts to climb down the cable. The Goblin flashes past Spider-Man, punching him. Like a gymnast on rings, Spider-Man's arms are stretched wide, one attached to the web supporting them all, the hand of the other still grasping the cable tightly. Another punch sends Spider-Man reeling and knocks the cable from his grasp, but he grabs the cable. MJ slips off it but clasps hold of the rail running around the cable car roof. The Green Goblin glides in for the kill as Spider-Man is lowering the cable car towards the barge. A blade shoots out, but the Goblin is hit by debris. Knocked off balance, the Goblin is kicked away by Spider-Man. The crowd on the bridge continues to throw debris. The cable car lands safely on the barge, MJ still clinging to it. MJ looks up at her hero and sees the Goblin closing in again. The Goblin throws a line around Spider-Man's waist and pulls him away behind the glider. Spider-Man crashes through the wall of an old ruin. He shoots out a web to steady himself and smashes through a pane of glass. Then a pumpkin bomb bounces towards him, and the fireball throws Spider-Man backwards. He's thrust through a brick wall and lands on the ground, half of his mask is burnt off. The Goblin reappears and punches Spider-Man in the chest and face, then kicks him and punches him again. A punch sends Spider-Man high into the air, and he lands heavily. The Goblin flips up and punches him again. Spider-Man shoots out a web and tries to pull himself clear, but the Goblin thwarts that. Spider-Man shoots more threads and builds a large web, which slows down the Green Goblin, but can't hold him. Spider-Man goes on the attack, but is beaten back. A kick to the head and a drop kick to the chest send Spider-Man reeling. He crashes into a brick wall and collapses on the ground. He raises his wrist, but the Goblin's boot comes down on it. Spider-Man's eyes flare and he grits his teeth. The Goblin lunges at Spider-Man with a multi-bladed spear, but Spider-Man stops it in front of his face. He pushes it back, then hurls the Goblin across the ruin. The Goblin scrabbles around, but webs wrap around the Goblin's ankles and Spider-Man yanks him down.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: He fastens a mesh of snares to the span, inside the hanging tram. The snare is straining to bear MJ, Spider-Man, and the tram. The Goblin notices a barge approach, and hearing the noise of the glider, Spider-Man and MJ glance up to see the Goblin on his path towards them. Part of the snare gives way, and everything plunges 20 feet. MJ scrambles over Spider-Man and begins to descend the wire. The Goblin streaks past Spider-Man, striking him. Like a gymnast on rings, Spider-Man's limbs are spread wide, one fastened to the snare supporting them all, the hand of the other still gripping the wire firmly. Another strike sends Spider-Man staggering and dislodges the wire from his grip, but he seizes the wire. MJ slips off it but clings to the rail encircling the tram roof. The Green Goblin slips in for the kill as Spider-Man is lowering the tram towards the barge. A blade ejects, but the Goblin is struck by fragments. Disoriented, the Goblin is kicked aside by Spider-Man. The crowd on the span continues to hurl fragments. The tram lands securely on the barge, MJ still clutching it. MJ glances up at her savior and sees the Goblin advancing again. The Goblin casts a cord around Spider-Man's waist and yanks him away behind the glider. Spider-Man crashes through the wall of an ancient ruin. He projects a snare to stabilize himself and crashes through a pane of glass. Then a pumpkin explosive bounces towards him, and the blast hurls Spider-Man backward. He's driven through a brick wall and lands on the ground, half of his disguise is charred off. The Goblin returns and strikes Spider-Man in the torso and visage, then kicks him and strikes him again. A strike sends Spider-Man high into the atmosphere, and he lands forcefully. The Goblin springs up and strikes him again. Spider-Man projects a snare and attempts to pull himself free, but the Goblin foils that. Spider-Man projects more filaments and constructs a large snare, which slows down the Green Goblin, but can't contain him. Spider-Man goes on the offense, but is forced back. A kick to the cranium and a drop kick to the torso send Spider-Man staggering. He crashes into a brick wall and collapses on the ground. He elevates his wrist, but the Goblin's boot descends on it. Spider-Man's eyes blaze, and he clenches his teeth. The Goblin lunges at Spider-Man with a multi-bladed spear, but Spider-Man halts it in front of his face. He thrusts it back, then flings the Goblin across the ruin. The Goblin scrabbles around, but snares coil around the Goblin's ankles and Spider-Man jerks him down.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: A network of webs is attached by him to the bridge, inside the dangling cable car. MJ, Spider-Man, and the car are being struggled to be held by the web. A tugboat is seen by the Goblin drawing near, and hearing the sound of the glider, the Goblin is looked up to by Spider-Man and MJ on his way towards them. Part of the web gives way, and everything is dropped 20 feet. Spider-Man is clambered over by MJ, and she starts to be climbed down the cable. Spider-Man is flashed past by the Goblin, who punches him. Like a gymnast on rings, Spider-Man's arms are stretched wide, one is attached to the web supporting them all, the cable is still grasped tightly in the hand of the other. Spider-Man is sent reeling by another punch, and the cable is knocked from his grasp, but the cable is grabbed by him. MJ slips off it but clasps hold of the rail running around the cable car roof. The kill is glided in for by the Green Goblin as the cable car is being lowered towards the barge by Spider-Man. A blade shoots out, but debris hits the Goblin. The Goblin is knocked off balance and kicked away by Spider-Man. Debris continues to be thrown by the crowd on the bridge. The barge safely lands the cable car, MJ still clinging to it. Her hero is looked up at by MJ, and she sees the Goblin closing in again. A line is thrown around Spider-Man's waist by the Goblin and he pulls him away behind the glider. The wall of an old ruin is crashed through by Spider-Man. A web is shot out by him to steady himself, and a pane of glass is smashed through. Then a pumpkin bomb bounces towards him, and he is thrown backwards by the fireball. He's thrust through a brick wall and lands on the ground, half of his mask burnt off. Spider-Man is punched in the chest and face by the Goblin, then kicked and punched again. Spider-Man is sent high into the air by a punch, and he lands heavily. The Goblin flips up and punches him again. A web is shot out by Spider-Man as he tries to pull himself clear, but the Goblin thwarts that. More threads are shot by Spider-Man, and a large web is built, which slows down the Green Goblin, but can't hold him. The attack is gone on by Spider-Man, but he is beaten back. Spider-Man is sent reeling by a kick to the head and a drop-kick to the chest. A crash into a brick wall and a collapse on the ground follow. His wrist is raised by him, but his wrist is brought down on by the Goblin's boot. Spider-Man's eyes flare, and his teeth are gritted by him. Spider-Man is lunged at by the Goblin with a multi-bladed spear, but it is stopped in front of his face by Spider-Man. It is pushed back by him, then the Goblin is hurled across the ruin. The Goblin scrabbles around, but webs wrap around the Goblin's ankles, and he is yanked down by Spider-Man.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: He attaches webs to the bridge and the dangling cable car, struggling to hold MJ, Spider-Man, and the car. The Goblin sees a tugboat and, hearing the glider, Spider-Man and MJ spot the Goblin approaching. Part of the web gives way, dropping everything 20 feet. MJ climbs over Spider-Man and descends the cable. The Goblin punches Spider-Man, whose arms stretch wide, one holding the web, the other gripping the cable. Another punch makes Spider-Man lose the cable, but he grabs it again. MJ slips but holds the cable car roof rail. As Spider-Man lowers the cable car to the barge, the Goblin attacks, but debris hits him. Spider-Man kicks the Goblin away, and the crowd throws debris. The cable car lands safely, with MJ clinging to it. She sees the Goblin closing in. He pulls Spider-Man with a line, crashing him through a ruin wall. Spider-Man steadies himself with a web but is thrown back by a pumpkin bomb. He crashes through a wall, half his mask burnt. The Goblin punches and kicks Spider-Man, sending him flying. Spider-Man tries to escape with webs, but the Goblin stops him. Spider-Man builds a web to slow the Goblin but is beaten back. A kick and drop kick send Spider-Man crashing into a wall. The Goblin lunges with a spear, but Spider-Man stops it, hurling the Goblin across the ruin. Webs wrap around the Goblin's ankles, and Spider-Man pulls him down.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: He attaches webs to the bridge and cable car, struggling to hold MJ, Spider-Man, and the car. The Goblin approaches, and Spider-Man and MJ see him. The web partially gives way, dropping everything 20 feet. MJ climbs down the cable, and the Goblin punches Spider-Man, who clings to the cable. MJ slips but holds the cable car rail. The Goblin attacks as Spider-Man lowers the car to a barge. Debris hits the Goblin, and Spider-Man kicks him away. The crowd throws debris, and the car lands safely. MJ sees the Goblin return, who pulls Spider-Man away. Spider-Man crashes through a ruin, steadies himself with a web, but a bomb throws him back, burning his mask. The Goblin punches and kicks Spider-Man, who tries to escape with webs but is thwarted. Spider-Man builds a web to slow the Goblin but is beaten back. A kick sends him into a wall. The Goblin lunges with a spear, but Spider-Man stops it, hurls the Goblin, and wraps his ankles with webs, pulling him down.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Inside the precariously dangling cable car, Spider-Man meticulously attaches a complex network of webs to the bridge. This intricate webbing is desperately struggling to support the weight of MJ, Spider-Man himself, and the entire cable car. Meanwhile, the menacing Goblin observes a tugboat drawing near, and upon hearing the ominous sound of the glider, both Spider-Man and MJ instinctively look up to see the Goblin rapidly approaching them. Suddenly, a portion of the web gives way, causing everything to plummet a nerve-wracking 20 feet. In a moment of urgency, MJ clambers over Spider-Man and begins to carefully climb down the cable. The Goblin, in a flash, zooms past Spider-Man, delivering a powerful punch. Like a skilled gymnast on rings, Spider-Man's arms are stretched wide apart, with one hand firmly attached to the web that is supporting them all, while the other hand tenaciously grasps the cable. Another forceful punch sends Spider-Man reeling and knocks the cable from his grasp, but he manages to grab it again. MJ slips off the cable but manages to clasp hold of the rail running around the roof of the cable car. As the Green Goblin glides in for the kill, Spider-Man is in the process of lowering the cable car towards the barge. A blade suddenly shoots out, but the Goblin is unexpectedly hit by flying debris. Knocked off balance, the Goblin is kicked away by Spider-Man. The crowd on the bridge continues to hurl debris. The cable car lands safely on the barge, with MJ still clinging to it. She looks up at her hero and sees the Goblin closing in once more. The Goblin throws a line around Spider-Man's waist and pulls him away behind the glider. Spider-Man crashes through the wall of an old ruin. He quickly shoots out a web to steady himself and smashes through a pane of glass. Then, a pumpkin bomb bounces ominously towards him, and the resulting fireball violently throws Spider-Man backwards. He is thrust through a brick wall and lands heavily on the ground, with half of his mask burnt off. The Goblin reappears and delivers a series of punches to Spider-Man's chest and face, then kicks him and punches him again. A powerful punch sends Spider-Man soaring high into the air, and he lands heavily. The Goblin flips up and punches him once more. Spider-Man shoots out a web and attempts to pull himself clear, but the Goblin thwarts his efforts. Spider-Man shoots more threads and constructs a large web, which momentarily slows down the Green Goblin, but ultimately cannot hold him. Spider-Man goes on the offensive, but is beaten back. A kick to the head and a drop kick to the chest send Spider-Man reeling. He crashes into a brick wall and collapses on the ground. He raises his wrist, but the Goblin's boot comes down forcefully on it. Spider-Man's eyes flare with determination, and he grits his teeth. The Goblin lunges at Spider-Man with a multi-bladed spear, but Spider-Man stops it just in front of his face. He pushes it back with all his might, then hurls the Goblin across the ruin. The Goblin scrabbles around, but webs quickly wrap around his ankles, and Spider-Man yanks him down with a decisive pull.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Within the confines of a precariously hanging cable car, Spider-Man focuses intently as he meticulously attaches an elaborate and intricate network of webs firmly to the bridge. This complex webbing is desperately and strenuously struggling to uphold the considerable weight of Mary Jane, Spider-Man himself, and the entirety of the cable car. All the while, the menacing Green Goblin keenly observes a tugboat drawing near in the distance, and upon hearing the ominous and foreboding sound of the glider, both Spider-Man and Mary Jane instinctively look up and see the Goblin rapidly approaching with great speed. Suddenly, a portion of the webbing gives way unexpectedly, causing everything to plummet a nerve-wracking 20 feet downward. In a moment filled with urgency and determination, MJ clambers over Spider-Man and begins the challenging task of carefully climbing down the cable. The Goblin, in a flash of movement, zooms past Spider-Man, delivering a powerful and forceful punch. Like a skilled gymnast performing on rings, Spider-Man's arms are stretched wide apart, with one hand firmly attached to the web that is supporting them all, while the other hand tenaciously grasps the cable. Another forceful punch sends Spider-Man reeling and knocks the cable from his grasp, but he manages to grab hold of it once again. MJ slips off the cable but manages to clasp onto the rail running around the roof of the cable car just in time. As the Green Goblin glides in for the kill, Spider-Man is in the process of deftly lowering the cable car towards the barge. A blade suddenly shoots out, but the Goblin is unexpectedly hit by debris flying through the air. Knocked off balance, the Goblin is then kicked away by Spider-Man. The crowd gathered on the bridge continues to hurl debris outward. Miraculously, the cable car lands safely on the waiting barge below, with MJ still clinging tightly to it. She looks up at her hero with admiration and sees the Goblin ominously closing in once more. The Goblin throws a line around Spider-Man's waist and pulls him away behind the glider with great force. Spider-Man crashes through the wall of an old, crumbling ruin. He quickly shoots out a web to steady himself and smashes through a pane of glass. Then, a pumpkin bomb bounces ominously towards him, and the resulting fireball violently throws Spider-Man backward with great force. He is thrust through a brick wall and lands heavily on the ground, with half of his mask burnt off from the intense heat. The Goblin reappears and delivers a series of powerful punches to Spider-Man's chest and face, then kicks him and punches him again with relentless force. A particularly powerful punch sends Spider-Man soaring high into the air, and he lands heavily on the ground. The Goblin flips up and punches him once more with intense vigor. Spider-Man shoots out a web and attempts to pull himself clear of the situation, but the Goblin is quick to thwart his efforts. Spider-Man shoots more threads and constructs a large web, which momentarily slows down the formidable Green Goblin, but ultimately cannot hold him. Spider-Man goes on the offensive, bravely trying to gain the upper hand, but is beaten back by the formidable foe. A kick to the head and a drop kick to the chest send Spider-Man reeling and disoriented. He crashes into a brick wall and collapses on the ground, exhausted. He manages to raise his wrist, but the Goblin's boot comes down forcefully on it, pinning him down. Spider-Man's eyes flare with determination and a fiery resolve, and he grits his teeth. The Goblin lunges at Spider-Man with a multi-bladed spear, but Spider-Man stops it just in front of his face. He pushes it back with all his might, then hurls the Goblin across the ruin with remarkable strength. The Goblin scrabbles around desperately, but webs quickly wrap around his ankles, and Spider-Man yanks him down with a decisive and powerful pull.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He begins by carefully attaching a complex network of webs to the bridge, ensuring they are securely fastened inside the dangling cable car. This intricate webbing is tasked with the immense challenge of supporting MJ, Spider-Man, and the car itself. As the Goblin notices a tugboat approaching, the distinct sound of the glider captures the attention of Spider-Man and MJ, prompting them to look up and spot the Goblin rapidly advancing towards them. Suddenly, a section of the web gives way, causing everything to plummet 20 feet. In response, MJ urgently clambers over Spider-Man, making her way to climb down the cable. The Goblin swiftly flashes past Spider-Man, delivering a forceful punch. Spider-Man's arms stretch wide like a gymnast on rings, with one arm attached to the web that supports them all, while his other hand maintains a tight grip on the cable. Another powerful punch from the Goblin sends Spider-Man reeling, causing the cable to slip from his grasp, but he quickly manages to grab it again. MJ loses her grip on the cable but manages to clasp onto the rail running around the cable car roof. As the Green Goblin glides in for the kill, Spider-Man focuses on lowering the cable car towards the barge. A blade suddenly shoots out, but the Goblin is struck by debris, knocking him off balance. Seizing the opportunity, Spider-Man kicks the Goblin away. Meanwhile, the crowd on the bridge continues to hurl debris. The cable car lands safely on the barge, with MJ still clinging to it. She looks up at her hero and sees the Goblin closing in once more. The Goblin throws a line around Spider-Man's waist, yanking him away behind the glider. Spider-Man crashes through the wall of an old ruin, but he quickly shoots out a web to steady himself and smashes through a pane of glass. A pumpkin bomb then bounces towards him, and the resulting fireball propels Spider-Man backwards. He is thrust through a brick wall and lands heavily on the ground, with half of his mask burnt off. The Goblin reappears, delivering a series of punches to Spider-Man's chest and face, followed by a kick and another punch. A particularly strong punch sends Spider-Man soaring into the air, and he lands with a heavy thud. The Goblin flips up and punches him again. In an attempt to escape, Spider-Man shoots out a web and tries to pull himself clear, but the Goblin thwarts his efforts. Undeterred, Spider-Man shoots more threads, constructing a large web that momentarily slows down the Green Goblin, but ultimately fails to hold him. Spider-Man goes on the offensive, but is quickly beaten back. A kick to the head and a drop kick to the chest send Spider-Man reeling, causing him to crash into a brick wall and collapse on the ground. As he raises his wrist, the Goblin's boot comes down on it. Spider-Man's eyes flare with determination as he grits his teeth. The Goblin lunges at Spider-Man with a multi-bladed spear, but Spider-Man stops it just in front of his face. He pushes the spear back with force, then hurls the Goblin across the ruin. The Goblin scrabbles around, but Spider-Man swiftly wraps webs around the Goblin's ankles and yanks him down, gaining the upper hand.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Spider-Man secures a network of webs to the bridge, struggling to support MJ, himself, and the cable car. As a tugboat approaches, the Goblin arrives, causing part of the web to give way and everything to drop 20 feet. MJ climbs over Spider-Man to descend the cable, but the Goblin attacks, knocking Spider-Man's grip loose. MJ clings to the cable car's rail while Spider-Man lowers it toward the barge. The Goblin, hit by debris from the crowd, is kicked away by Spider-Man, allowing the cable car to land safely with MJ aboard. As the Goblin returns, he ensnares Spider-Man and drags him through a ruin wall. Spider-Man stabilizes himself with a web but is blasted by a pumpkin bomb, burning half his mask. The Goblin relentlessly attacks, sending Spider-Man crashing into a wall. Despite Spider-Man's attempts to counter with webs, the Goblin overpowers him. Spider-Man builds a large web to slow the Goblin, but it fails to hold. After a series of blows, Spider-Man is pinned, but he deflects the Goblin's spear and hurls him across the ruin. He then ensnares the Goblin's ankles with webs, pulling him down.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He attaches a network of webs to the bridge, a structure akin to the iconic Brooklyn Bridge known for its stunning views and historical significance, inside the dangling cable car. The web is struggling to hold MJ, Spider-Man, and the car, perched precariously over the river below. The Goblin, notorious for his high-tech arsenal and ruthless tactics, sees a tugboat, a small and powerful vessel commonly used to guide larger ships, draw near, and hearing the sound of the glider, Spider-Man and MJ look up to see the Goblin on his way towards them. Part of the web gives way, and everything drops 20 feet, creating a gasp among the onlookers. MJ clambers over Spider-Man, a move showcasing her agility and bravery, and starts to climb down the cable. The Goblin flashes past Spider-Man, punching him with a strength enhanced by his suit's technology. Like a gymnast on rings, Spider-Man's arms are stretched wide, one attached to the web supporting them all, the hand of the other still grasping the cable tightly, a testament to his superhuman reflexes and strength. Another punch sends Spider-Man reeling and knocks the cable from his grasp, but he grabs the cable with the agility and speed that have saved him countless times before. MJ slips off it but clasps hold of the rail running around the cable car roof, her fingers white-knuckled with tension. The Green Goblin glides in for the kill as Spider-Man is lowering the cable car towards the barge, a flat-bottomed boat often used for transport. A blade shoots out, but the Goblin is hit by debris, hurled by the crowd on the bridge who stand in solidarity with Spider-Man. Knocked off balance, the Goblin is kicked away by Spider-Man, whose quick thinking turns the tide. The crowd on the bridge continues to throw debris, inspired by Spider-Man's resilience. The cable car lands safely on the barge, MJ still clinging to it, breathing a sigh of relief. MJ looks up at her hero and sees the Goblin closing in again. The Goblin throws a line around Spider-Man's waist and pulls him away behind the glider, a maneuver that showcases his malicious intent and cunning. Spider-Man crashes through the wall of an old ruin, remnants of a forgotten era that still stand amidst a modern cityscape. He shoots out a web to steady himself and smashes through a pane of glass, shards flying through the air. Then a pumpkin bomb, one of the Goblin's signature weapons that explode with devastating effect, bounces towards him, and the fireball throws Spider-Man backwards. He's thrust through a brick wall and lands on the ground, half of his mask is burnt off, exposing part of his identity. The Goblin reappears and punches Spider-Man in the chest and face, then kicks him and punches him again with relentless aggression. A punch sends Spider-Man high into the air, and he lands heavily, each impact a testament to his endurance. The Goblin flips up and punches him again, taunting him with every blow. Spider-Man shoots out a web and tries to pull himself clear, but the Goblin thwarts that with strategic precision. Spider-Man shoots more threads and builds a large web, which slows down the Green Goblin, but can't hold him, highlighting both Spider-Man's ingenuity and the Goblin's ferocity. Spider-Man goes on the attack, but is beaten back, determination in his every move. A kick to the head and a drop kick to the chest send Spider-Man reeling, his vision blurred by the assault. He crashes into a brick wall and collapses on the ground, struggling to rise. He raises his wrist, poised to fight back, but the Goblin's boot comes down on it, pinning him in place. Spider-Man's eyes flare and he grits his teeth, summoning every ounce of his strength and willpower. The Goblin lunges at Spider-Man with a multi-bladed spear, a deadly weapon designed for swift attacks, but Spider-Man stops it in front of his face, demonstrating his unmatched reflexes. He pushes it back, then hurls the Goblin across the ruin in a desperate act of defense. The Goblin scrabbles around, but webs wrap around the Goblin's ankles and Spider-Man yanks him down, asserting his resolve to protect those he loves.

Another punch sends SpiderMan reeling and knocks the cable from his grasp but he grabs the cable. MJ slips off it but clasps hold of the rail running around the cable car roof. The Green Goblin glides in for the kill as SpiderMan is lowering the cable car towards the barge. A blade shoots out but the Goblin is hit by debris. Knocked off balance the Goblin is kicked away by SpiderMan. The crowd on the bridge continues to throw debris. The cable car lands safely on the barge MJ still clinging to it. MJ looks up at her hero and sees the Goblin closing in again. The Goblin throws a line around SpiderMan's waist and pulls him away behind the glider. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. SpiderMan crashes through the wall of an old ruin. He shoots out a web to steady himself and smashes through a pane of glass. Then a pumpkin bomb bounces towards him and the fireball throws SpiderMan backwards. He is thrust through a brick wall and lands on the ground. half of his mask is burnt off. The Goblin reappears and punches SpiderMan in the chest and face then kicks him and punches him again. A punch sends SpiderMan high into the air and he lands heavily. The Goblin flips up and punches him again. SpiderMan shoots out a web and tries to pull himself clear but the Goblin thwarts that. SpiderMan shoots more threads and builds a large web which slows down the Green Goblin but cannot hold him. SpiderMan goes on the attack but is beaten back. A kick to the head and a drop kick to the chest send SpiderMan reeling. He crashes into a brick wall and collapses on the ground. He raises his wrist but the Goblin's boot comes down on it. SpiderMan's eyes flare and he grits his teeth. The Goblin lunges at SpiderMan with a multibladed spear but SpiderMan stops it in front of his face. He pushes it back then hurls the Goblin across the ruin. The Goblin scrabbles around but webs wrap around the Goblin's ankles and SpiderMan yanks him down.

The Goblin sees a tugboat draw near and hearing the sound of the glider. SpiderMan and MJ look up to see the Goblin on his way towards them. Part of the web gives way and everything drops 20 feet. MJ clambers over SpiderMan and starts to climb down the cable. The Goblin flashes past SpiderMan punching him. Like a gymnast on rings. SpiderMan's arms are stretched wide one attached to the web supporting them all the hand of the other still grasping the cable tightly. The Goblin sees a tugboat draw near and hearing the sound of the glider. SpiderMan and MJ look up to see the Goblin on his way towards them. SpiderMan's eyes flare and he grits his teeth. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: She attaches a tapestry of threads to the skyscraper, within the swaying gondola. The thread is struggling to hold KT, Cat-Woman, and the gondola. The Wizard watches a submarine drift close, and hearing the hum of the hoverboard, Cat-Woman and KT glance up to spot the Wizard approaching them. A section of the thread unravels, and everything descends 20 stories. KT scrambles over Cat-Woman and begins to slide down the rope. The Wizard zips past Cat-Woman, slapping her. Like a dancer with ribbons, Cat-Woman's arms are stretched wide, one attached to the thread supporting them all, the fingers of the other still clutching the rope firmly. Another slap sends Cat-Woman swaying and knocks the rope from her grip, but she snatches the rope. KT slips off it but latches onto the barrier lining the gondola rooftop. The Blue Wizard hovers in for the catch as Cat-Woman is lowering the gondola towards the raft. A sword extends outward, but the Wizard is struck by fragments. Unsteady, the Wizard is booted away by Cat-Woman. The gathering on the skyscraper continues to hurl fragments. The gondola lands securely on the raft, KT still hanging onto it. KT gazes up at her champion and perceives the Wizard nearing again. The Wizard tosses a cord around Cat-Woman's waist and tugs her away behind the hoverboard. Cat-Woman bursts through the barrier of an ancient fortress. She shoots out a thread to balance herself and crashes through a windowpane. Then a melon grenade bounces towards her, and the explosion hurls Cat-Woman backwards. She's propelled through a stone barricade and lands on the soil, part of her helmet is scorched away. The Wizard returns and strikes Cat-Woman in the torso and helmet, then kicks her and strikes her again. A strike sends Cat-Woman soaring into the sky, and she lands with a thud. The Wizard leaps up and strikes her again. Cat-Woman shoots out a thread and attempts to tug herself away, but the Wizard foils that. Cat-Woman releases more strands and constructs an expansive weave, which halts the Blue Wizard, but can't halt him. Cat-Woman launches an assault, but is driven back. A headbutt and a dropkick to the torso send Cat-Woman staggering. She crashes into a stone barricade and falls to the ground. She lifts her finger, but the Wizard's boot presses down on it. Cat-Woman's eyes blaze and she clenches her jaw. The Wizard lunges at Cat-Woman with a multi-bladed lance, but Cat-Woman halts it before her face. She pushes it back, then flings the Wizard across the fortress. The Wizard scrambles around, but threads coil around the Wizard's ankles and Cat-Woman pulls him down.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Spider-Man secures webs to a bridge to hold himself, MJ, and a cable car. The Green Goblin approaches on a glider, causing the web to sag, dropping them 20 feet. MJ climbs down the cable while Spider-Man fights the Goblin. A punch knocks Spider-Man further, but he catches the cable as MJ holds onto the car roof. Spider-Man lowers the cable car to safety on a barge amidst debris thrown from a crowd. The Goblin ensnares Spider-Man, leading to a fierce battle. Spider-Man smashes through ruins, but a pumpkin bomb hits him, burning part of his mask. Despite struggling, Spider-Man creates a large web to slow the Goblin, but is overpowered. As Spider-Man endures more attacks, the Goblin lunges with a spear. Spider-Man deflects it and ensnares the Goblin, pulling him down with webs.
